```{r}
library(jsonlite)

```

```{r}
q_description <- read_schema("description")
```


```{r}
desc_query <- ghql_query(q_description, name = "logrrr", owner = "metrumresearchgroup", branchfile = "master:DESCRIPTION")
str(desc_query$data)
```
